titleStmt.title: The practise of princes. Published by A. Ar
titleStmt.author: Ar., A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by the successors of Giles Thorp],

notesStmt.note: A Puritan attack against Charles I and his Spanish policies.
Place of publication and printer statement from STC.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-C⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
